This directory contains some testdata.

ngExtractedMaster1.xlf is a file extracted from angular templates by using ng-i18n.
It contains some IDs.

ngExtractedMaster2.xlf is a second extracted master after the templates had been edited.
It contains the same IDs as Master1, but some additional ones.
2 IDs for "Startseite" and "Suchen" are removed.

ngttranslate.xlf is an extracted master with some messages with description and meaning to be used with ngx-translate.

The xmb files are the same in principle, but for format xmb.
